domains.collapse_risk: If collapsed into internet_app, compliance requirements become optional prose instead of enforceable obligations.
domains.name: Compliance Lite
domains.reason_for_existence: Audit posture without full regulated burden; change control and traceability as obligations.
domains.summary: Enterprise compliance-lite: change control, traceability, and separation-of-duties evidence without full regulated burden.

domains.collapse_risk: If merged into internet_app, 'truth' collapses into a database assumption and proofs become incoherent.
domains.name: Distributed Truth
domains.reason_for_existence: Coordination/truth under failure regime: consensus, partitions, forks, replication.
domains.summary: Consensus/replication/consistency/partition behavior; truth under failure and coordination.

domains.collapse_risk: If merged, simulation-specific invariants become optional and correctness becomes untestable.
domains.name: Game/Simulation
domains.reason_for_existence: Simulation loop regime: deterministic ticks/frames, state rollback, netcode invariants.
domains.summary: Tick/frame budgets, deterministic simulation, asset pipelines, netcode invariants.

domains.collapse_risk: If merged, timing obligations become best-effort and correctness claims are false.
domains.name: Hard Real-Time
domains.reason_for_existence: Deadline-correctness regime; timing/jitter constraints are part of correctness.
domains.summary: Deadline and jitter constrained systems; bounded time/space and scheduling physics.

domains.collapse_risk: If collapsed into capability, access becomes feature-like rather than constraint-like and leaks occur.
domains.name: Identity Access (Lite)
domains.reason_for_existence: Access control regime: identity binding and authorization receipts as first-class obligations.
domains.summary: Reusable identity/login physics: wallet signature auth, portable DID bindings, and agent-safe access receipts.

domains.collapse_risk: Collapsing into other domains forces unrelated constraints onto everyday apps (or hides real ops obligations).
domains.name: Internet App
domains.reason_for_existence: Baseline internet software regime: async IO + persistence + multi-tenant surfaces.
domains.summary: General internet software: CRUD/content/workflows/integrations with production-grade ops and evidence.

domains.collapse_risk: If merged into app domains, low-level safety constraints become invisible until catastrophic failures.
domains.name: Kernel/Runtime
domains.reason_for_existence: Runtime substrate regime: scheduling/memory/ABI/toolchain constraints and deep correctness evidence.
domains.summary: OS/runtime/toolchain physics: scheduling, memory management, ABI/toolchain constraints, deep correctness evidence.

domains.collapse_risk: Without a membrane domain, mixing becomes implicit and contradictions appear as waivers.
domains.name: Membrane
domains.reason_for_existence: Defines boundary physics for connecting immiscible domains without contaminating them.
domains.summary: Neutral interface boundary primitives used to connect immiscible domains without contaminating domain physics.

domains.collapse_risk: If collapsed, non-determinism and model risk are misrepresented as ordinary app behavior.
domains.name: ML Platform
domains.reason_for_existence: Probabilistic inference lifecycle regime: lineage, eval, drift, model governance.
domains.summary: Data lineage, training/eval/deploy lifecycle, drift, reproducibility and model governance.

domains.collapse_risk: If removed, a whole class of 'domain enabled but empty' regressions can slip through.
domains.name: No Pack Test
domains.reason_for_existence: Harness-only domain used to prove the checker catches missing domain packs.
domains.summary: Regression domain: intentionally has no bond pack; any compound using it must fail.

domains.collapse_risk: If merged into internet_app, privacy becomes a promise rather than a boundary-enforced constraint.
domains.name: Privacy Compute
domains.reason_for_existence: Information-flow and selective disclosure regime; prove properties without leaking payloads.
domains.summary: Selective disclosure, proof-carrying claims, and minimized disclosure verification physics.

domains.collapse_risk: If not isolated, proof claims become non-repeatable and verification becomes narrative.
domains.name: Proof Lane
domains.reason_for_existence: Deterministic verification regime: reproducible builds + receipts + independent re-checkability.
domains.summary: Deterministic receipts, reproducible builds, and independent verification workflows (proof as a first-class domain).

domains.collapse_risk: If merged with compliance_lite, safety requirements get treated as 'nice-to-have' checklists.
domains.name: Regulated Safety
domains.reason_for_existence: High-stakes correctness regime where failure is catastrophic/legal; safety-case evidence required.
domains.summary: External proof burdens: traceability, change control, safety case evidence, separation of duties.
